content.1: And Jehoshaphat his son reigned in his stead, and strengthened himself against Israel.
content.2: And he placed forces in all the fenced cities of Judah, and set garrisons in the land of Judah, and in the cities of Ephraim, which Asa his father had taken.
content.6: And his heart was lifted up in the ways of the
content.7: Also in the third year of his reign he sent to his princes,
content.9: And they taught in Judah, and
content.12: And Jehoshaphat waxed great exceedingly; and he built in Judah castles, and cities of store.
content.13: And he had much business in the cities of Judah: and the men of war, mighty men of valour,
content.17: And of Benjamin; Eliada a mighty man of valour, and with him armed men with bow and shield two hundred thousand.
